mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SEAT WHERE ROOM_ID = #{roomId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT BRANCH_ID as branchId, ROOM_ID as roomId, SEAT_NM as seatNm, SEAT_Y as seatY, SEAT_X as seatX, USE_YN as useYN FROM SEAT WHERE SEAT_NM = #{seatNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

INSERT INTO SEAT ( BRANCH_ID, ROOM_ID, SEAT_NM, SEAT_Y, SEAT_X, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{branchId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || #{seatX, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{seatY, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatX, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{useYN, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT T.RNUM as NUM ,T.BRANCH_ID as branchId ,T.ROOM_ID as roomId ,T.SEAT_NM as seatNm ,T.SEAT_Y as seatY ,T.SEAT_X as seatX ,T.USE_YN as useYN FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM SEAT
)A WHERE CEIL(ROWNUM/ #{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) = #{pageNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )T ORDER BY 1, 2, 3

INSERT INTO SEAT_RESERVATION ( BRANCH_ID, ROOM_ID, SEAT_NM, SEAT_Y, SEAT_X, USE_YN, SCREEN_ID ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.BRANCH_ID, a.ROOM_ID, a.SEAT_NM, a.SEAT_Y, a.SEAT_X, a.USE_YN, b.screenId FROM SEAT a, ( SELECT #{screenId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as screenId FROM DUAL )b WHERE a.ROOM_ID = #{roomId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT T.RNUM as NUM ,T.BRANCH_ID as branchId ,T.ROOM_ID as roomId ,T.SEAT_NM as seatNm ,T.SEAT_Y as seatY ,T.SEAT_X as seatX ,T.USE_YN as useYN ,SCREEN_ID as screenId FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM SEAT_RESERVATION
)A WHERE CEIL(ROWNUM/ #{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) = #{pageNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )T ORDER BY 1, 2, 3
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SEAT_RESERVATION WHERE SCREEN_ID = #{screenId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT BRANCH_ID as branchId, ROOM_ID as roomId, SEAT_NM as seatNm, SEAT_Y as seatY, SEAT_X as seatX, USE_YN as useYN, SCREEN_ID as screenId FROM SEAT_RESERVATION WHERE SEAT_NM = #{seatNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SCREEN_ID = #{screenId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
